headline: Textron Inc. (TXT): One of the Top Defense Stock Picks from the Goldman Sachs Portfolio
summary: We recently published a list of Goldman Sachs Defense Stocks: Top 12 Stock Picks. In this article, we will take a look at where Textron Inc. (NYSE:TXT) stands against other top defense stock picks from the Goldman Sachs Portfolio. After a subdued start to the year, American defense stocks are beginning to see improved returns. […]

headline: McCauley Propeller secures ANAC certification for Beechcraft King Air B300 series high-performance propeller
summary: WICHITA, Kan., April 22, 2025--McCauley Propeller announced its C780 propeller for the Beechcraft King Air B300 series successfully achieved ANAC certification.
